full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR RTA PHYUG GI 'BRAS MCHOD BYA BAR, ,'DOD PA'I RNAMS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES SOG PO YUL DU RGOD MA'I 'BRAS MCHOD ZHES BYA BA GRAGS SHING SNGA MA MCHOD PA NI, ,BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA MING CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I RGYAL PHRAN BLO BO RNAMS, ,RANG RANG GIS CHU MING GI 'JUG CING RANG RANG GI BSAM BZHIN BYA BA YIN, ,DE'I GO RAM LA SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD NAS LHA KLU SA BDAG SOGS SNGON DU 'JUG PA NI TSUL MED PA'I PHYIR SEMS CAN LA PHAN THOGS PA'I BSAM SDE BLO BZANG MING CAN GYI SBYAR DU, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
